title: Ho bisogno di un consiglio
body:
mi potreste dare delle delucidazioni su come si usi Vladimir ?
In particolare vorrei sapere maestrie e build grazie in anticipo{{champion:8}}

replies.body:
vlad is a really great tank, he regens a lot of health, has high damage, escape moves and AoE skills, basically with vlad you just have to spam op skills and build everything you can find in tank items section
shish
